string-array.name: questions
string-array.item: Is it possible to time travel?
Is it safe to swim with sharks?
Does the sun rise in the east and set in the west?
Is the Earth the third planet from the sun?
Is the Great Wall of China visible from space?
Is the Earth the only planet with liquid water?
Can humans fly without any mechanical aid?
Is the moon larger than the Earth?
Is the Statue of Liberty located in Los Angeles?
Is the speed of sound faster than the speed of a bullet?
